name: Lost World (itch)
description:
Lost World centers around girl in a post-apocalyptic world that is completely vulnerable in a desolate sea, surrounded by the wreckage of her world. Luckily, the wind is there to accompany her in her travels. Manipulate the wind to guide the girl through her surroundings and find enlightenment.

Controls:

  • Use your palm to push the wind
  • Use your mouse to rotate the camera

Developers:

  • Brian Clanton
  • Khoa Ha
  • Andrew Hollenbach
  • Joseph Tong
